meta.title: Support
meta.description: Have questions or need assistance? Check out our frequently asked questions or contact our support team. We’re here to help you!

moreQuestions.title: Still have questions?
moreQuestions.subtitle: Please describe your case to receive the most accurate advice.

content.question: How do I create an account?
content.answer: Click the 'Try for free' button on the homepage. You can sign up using your email address or log in with Google, Facebook, or GitHub.

content.question: Do I need to activate my account after registration?
content.answer: Yes, if you sign up using email, you'll receive a message with an activation link. Click it to activate your account and access the platform.

content.question: What are the password requirements?
content.answer: Your password must be at least 8 characters long and include one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one special character (e.g., !, @, #).

content.question: How can I change my password?
content.answer: If you log in using email and password, you can change it in the 'Account Settings' → 'Manage Account' section.

content.question: I forgot my password – what should I do?
content.answer: On the login page, click 'Forgot password?'. Enter your email address, and you'll receive a message with a reset link.

content.question: How can I update my personal details?
content.answer: Log in and go to 'Account Settings' → 'Personal Info' to edit your name or other profile details.

content.question: Where can I check or change my subscription plan?
content.answer: Log in and go to 'Account Settings' → 'Subscription' to view your current plan or switch to another.

content.question: How do I delete my account?
content.answer: Log in and go to 'Account Settings' → 'Manage Account'. You'll find the option to delete your account there.

content.question: How do courses work on the platform?
content.answer: Courses consist of interactive lessons that you complete at your own pace. These are not live classes – you learn whenever you want.

content.question: Do I need to install any additional software?
content.answer: No. Everything runs in your browser. You just need a computer or tablet with internet access.

content.question: Can I pause a course and continue later?
content.answer: Yes. Your progress is saved automatically, so you can return to the course at any time.

content.question: Do the courses include practical tasks?
content.answer: Yes. Each course includes interactive exercises and tasks that you can complete directly in your browser.

content.question: Will I get a certificate after completing a course?
content.answer: Yes. After completing a course on the Basic or Premium plan, you’ll receive a certificate that you can download or share.

content.question: Is access to courses time-limited?
content.answer: No. Once you purchase access, you have unlimited time to complete the course within your chosen plan.

content.question: Can I use the courses on my phone?
content.answer: Yes, our platform also works on mobile devices. For the best experience, we recommend using a tablet or computer.

content.question: Will I get a certificate after completing a course?
content.answer: Yes, after completing a course on the Basic or Premium plan, you'll receive a personalized certificate in PDF or PNG format.

content.question: Is the certificate available immediately after completing the course?
content.answer: Yes, the certificate is generated automatically once all lessons are completed. You can download it directly from the platform.

content.question: What does the certificate look like?
content.answer: The certificate includes your name, course title, completion date, and our programming school’s signature. You can add it to your CV or LinkedIn profile.

content.question: Can I get a certificate with a free plan?
content.answer: No. Certificates are available only to users with an active Basic or Premium plan.

content.question: Does the certificate have a unique ID?
content.answer: Yes, every certificate has a unique ID that allows for verification.

content.question: Are the certificates recognized by employers?
content.answer: Certificates demonstrate course completion and practical skills gained. Many learners add them to their portfolio or LinkedIn profiles as proof of learning.

content.question: How do I earn points on the platform?
content.answer: You earn points by completing quizzes, tasks in courses, and finishing chapters and entire courses.

content.question: What are points used for?
content.answer: Points show your learning progress and engagement.

content.question: Do points affect my certificate?
content.answer: No. You receive a certificate after completing the course regardless of your points. However, points are a sign of active learning.

content.question: Can I lose earned points?
content.answer: No, points earned during learning stay on your account and do not expire.

content.question: Where can I check my points?
content.answer: Your current point total is visible in your dashboard.

content.question: What payment methods are available?
content.answer: We accept payments by credit/debit card (Visa, Mastercard, etc.), as well as Google Pay and Apple Pay. All payments are processed securely via Stripe.

content.question: Is the payment one-time or recurring?
content.answer: Our plans are subscription-based – the payment renews automatically every month or year unless you cancel beforehand.

content.question: Can I pay using Google Pay or Apple Pay?
content.answer: Yes, Stripe supports both Google Pay and Apple Pay – you can use them during checkout on our platform.

content.question: Will I receive an invoice for my subscription?
content.answer: Yes, after each payment you will receive an invoice that you can download from your account settings under 'Payments'.

content.question: How can I cancel my subscription?
content.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time in the account settings under 'Subscription'. After cancellation, you'll retain access to courses until the end of the billing period.

content.question: Are my payment details secure?
content.answer: Yes, we use Stripe – one of the world’s most secure payment platforms. Your card details are not stored on our servers.

content.question: Do you offer a free trial?
content.answer: Every user can start learning for free with our free plan, which gives access to one chapter of each course. It's a great way to test the platform before upgrading.

content.question: What should I do if my payment was declined?
content.answer: Make sure your card is active and has sufficient funds. You can also try a different payment method (e.g. Google Pay). If the problem persists, contact our technical support.
